::Lord Elder::
   
  Elder: Splendid. Let's do that. I believe everyone is just about here.
   
  OOC: Are the Airtankers in their aircraft mode? Also, who is there currently? It alwats gets confusing to me with so many chars on one thing.

Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:
          Airtank: As a matter of fact, we prefer flying on our own. By the way,
why take a shuttle when we can carry everyone?

> ::Grimlock::
> 
> Grimlock is standing by on the rescue party shuttle. He waits for
Doc and Windlord and Perseus and whoever joins.
> 
> From the shuttle Grimlock opens a comm to the Airtankers.
> 
> Grimlock: Airtankers no like me Grimlock's flying?
